alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Hampden; Hampshire; Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:25PM EDT until July 08 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL WORCESTER...SOUTHEASTERN HAMPSHIRE...SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN AND NORTH CENTRAL HAMPDEN COUNTIES... At 525 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Belchertown, or near Amherst, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Holyoke, Amherst, Northampton, Ludlow, South Hadley, Easthampton, Belchertown, Wilbraham, Palmer, Ware, Granby, Hadley, Hatfield, Hardwick, Pelham, Petersham and New Salem. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
